signature: Predicate<T> allPredicate(Collection<? extends Predicate<? super T>>)

direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle the creation of a predicate that evaluates multiple predicates, with similar control flow and exception handling.
The validate method is directly called by the allPredicate method to ensure the predicates are valid before processing.
The coerce method is used within the allPredicate method to handle single predicate cases, ensuring type compatibility.
The truePredicate method is used in both allPredicate methods to return a predicate that always evaluates to true when no predicates are provided.
The test method is the core evaluation method for the AllPredicate class, which is closely related to the allPredicate methods that create these predicates.
